actions.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.
Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 226.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A joint resolution to provide for the extension of a temporary prohibition of strikes or lockout and to provide for binding arbitration with respect to the labor dispute between Amtrak and certain of its employees.

summary.text: Provides for a 90-day extension of a temporary prohibition of strikes or lockout in the labor dispute between Amtrak and the Brotherhood of Maintenance of Way Employees. Requires the use of binding arbitration, if necessary, to settle such dispute.

titles.title: A joint resolution to provide for the extension of a temporary prohibition of strikes or lockout and to provide for binding arbitration with respect to the labor dispute between Amtrak and certain of its employees.
